plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Tpsi to to access user location to provide nearby happy hour infos, distance from all stores, and map navigations to nearby stores.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with the friends about the bar they are rating.

infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: App would like to access user location to provide nearby happy hour infos, distance from all stores, and map navigations to nearby stores.
